sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.SPMUtilsFactory</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Factory object that encapsulates the instantiation of the SPMUtil extension point.</description>
        <name>SPMUtilsFactory</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SPMUtilsFactory = Class.create();
SPMUtilsFactory.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
		
	},
	
	getUtils: function() {
		if (typeof GlideScriptedExtensionPoint == "undefined") {
			gs.info(gs.getMessage("Scripted extension points are not enabled", epName));
			return false;
		}
		try {
			var ep = new GlideScriptedExtensionPoint().getExtensions('SPMUtils');
			if (ep.length > 0) {
				ep[0].initialize();
				return ep[0];
			}
		} catch (ex) {
			gs.error("global.SPMUtilsFactory: Error fetching extension point - "+ex);
		}

		return false;
	},
	type: 'SPMUtilsFactory'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-03-07 01:04:41</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>4e23fe59b3403300f224a72256a8dc26</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SPMUtilsFactory</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Portfolio Management Core" source="com.snc.service_portfolio_core">cf704d836d2620100acb70b353433066</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4e23fe59b3403300f224a72256a8dc26</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-03-07 05:56:32</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>585</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
